rules.description: Pok3r Volume Controls (fn + sdf to Volume down/up/mute)
Pok3r Media Keys (fn + qwe to Previous Title/Play-Pause/Next)
Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift + right_shift at the same time
Numeric Keypad Mode [Tab as trigger key, command as . and option-alt as ,]
Hyper Misc (Check https://github.com/Vonng/Capslock for all details)
